wikipedia_page.main: Reece Anthony Gray (born 1 September 1992) is a footballer who plays as a forward for Northwich Victoria. He played for Rochdale in the Football League. In a loan spell with Hyde in the 2011–12 season he won a Conference North winners medal.

response: Abadaki joined Hyde United on a month's loan with fellow Rochdale striker Reece Gray in February 2012. His loan was extended and at the end of his time with the club he had scored two goals in ten league appearances.
